boomi.description: Configuration for Boomi AtomSphere API integration
boomi.config_file_template:
# Boomi API Configuration
export BOOMI_BASE_URL="https://api.boomi.com"
export BOOMI_ACCOUNT_ID="your-account-id"
export BOOMI_USERNAME="BOOMI_TOKEN.your.email@your-company.com"
export BOOMI_API_TOKEN="your-api-key-here"
